Container.Name: wh-amp
Container.Overview: CubeCoders AMP - The powerful but simple to use game server control panel. Supports both Windows and Linux, easy to install and supports dozens of game servers and applications.
Container.Requires: AMP requires: - A license key for CubeCoders AMP. - Updating the "Post Arguments" with a MAC address. Learn more: https://github.com/MitchTalmadge/AMP-dockerized?tab=readme-ov-file#mac-address-important-please-read

Config.Name: AMP web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port AMP listens on.

Config.Name: AMP storage
Config.Description: The location where AMP stores its data.

Config.Name: AMP_LICENCE
Config.Description: The licence key for CubeCoders AMP.

Config.Name: USERNAME
Config.Description: The username of the admin user created on first boot.

Config.Name: PASSWORD
Config.Description: The password of the admin user. This value is only used when creating the new user.

Config.Name: AMP_RELEASE_STREAM
Config.Description: Don't change this unless you know what you're doing.
